arts.ttl: 'I was very close to signing for Man Utd – but Manuel Pellegrini made me change my mind'
arts.sum: Marcos Senna was on the brink of signing for Manchester United at the peak of Sir Alex Ferguson's glory years, but Manuel Pellegrini convinced him to spend three more years with Villarreal

arts.ttl: Sevilla’s Jesús Navas sets all-time Gran Derbi record
arts.sum: Sevilla star Jesús Navas has on Sunday etched his name ever further into the history books of Spanish football. As much comes owing to his latest appearance in El Gran…

arts.ttl: Sevilla’s open training session ahead of El Gran Derbi attracts over 16,000 fans
arts.sum: Sevilla held an open training session on Saturday at the Ramón Sánchez-Pizjúan ahead of Sunday’s clash with Real Betis in El Gran Derbi. The derby between Sevilla and Real Betis…

arts.ttl: Why Barcelona are already ‘concerned’ about Vitor Roque’s move to Real Betis
arts.sum: The powers that be at La Liga giants Barcelona are already beginning to grow concerned regarding the decision to send youngster Vitor Roque to Real Betis over the summer. That’s…

arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Man City target €32m Rodri replacement for January
arts.sum: The 23-year-old Argentine has drawn significant interest from the Premier League champions as they look for a potential signing in the January transfer window to replace the Rodi, who is out for the season after sustaining an ACL and meniscus damage to his knee in the 2-2 draw with Arsenal. However, sources close to the club suggest that City not only see Varela as a temporary replacement but also as someone who could partner Rodri when he returns to full fitness.
